text: Drobiny () is a rural locality (a village) in Klenovskoye Selsoviet, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 37 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located on the Cheptsa River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Drobiny
